MS MCQs

    Define an AI strategy to create business value - Knowledge Check

    »

    1. One way in which companies are integrating AI is the implementation of platforms that customers can interact with. Which type of intelligence are these platforms based on?

      Cognitive Intelligence

      Naturalistic Intelligence

      Intra-personal Intelligence

      Spatial Intelligence


    2. From an employee perspective, what is one of the primary goals of digitizing your organization?

      Create a technical aptitude baseline for all team members.

      Extend the life cycles of legacy equipment and infrastructure.

      Break down silos that hamper communication and collaboration.

      Transfer all decision-making processes over to AI to eliminate human variability.


    3. What is a crucial step that companies must accomplish in order to realize the full potential of AI?

      Eliminate unstructured data in order to streamline the data retrieval process.

      Enable every employee to become a citizen data scientist.

      Rearchitect their enterprise datacenters to become cloud-first organizations.

      Provide multiple channels for technical and non-technical users alike.


    4. Which is an example of a fundamental technology benefiting from the advances and investment in machine learning-based AI?

      Natural Language Processing

      Software defined storage

      Hyperconverged Infrastructure

      DNA storage
